name: Chinese seal - Heart.
description:
Make a cute little impression with this small Chinese seal that carries the word "Heart". It is carved in the calligraphy way of writing the word, and the character would come out in red with a border. This seal could be used in the making of cards, paintings and decorative items, especially for someone special!

Base of the seal is a square with sides measuring 0.7", and a vertical height of 2.3".

name: Copper necklace.
description:
The Chinese symbol Yin-yang is embedded beneath a piece of clear acrylic glass in a round copper pendant. 

The symbol on this particular seal Yin-yang, is an important concept in Chinese philosophy, particularly in Taoism. It stems from an observation of the duality in nature, and symbolizes two opposing yet interdependent forces. The ideal state being a balance between them both.

This symbol is printed on high quality paper using a Baisimu hand-carved seal. The pendant comes with a matching copper chain as shown in the pictures.


The round pendant measures 1" across in diameter, and the copper chain measures 21" in total. The chain can be shortened to your preferred length when worn simply by adjusting the location of the clasp.

name: Wooden Bookmark.
description:
This bookmark is made of black suede string, a dainty red rose charm, and a piece of hand printed wooden charm, which has the impression of the Chinese character for "Book". It is hand printed using a seal hand carved by me. 

At both ends of the bookmark are a chain and clasp which secure it onto the book and prevent it from falling off. Use this unique bookmark to mark your pages in style. It is ideal for books and organizers!

Bookmark measures 19"(48cm) in total. The chain below the wooden charm makes it suitable for books of different sizes.
